definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: crush, pulverise, thresh; be fine (Ar. daq=a be or become thin, minute; Eth. daqaqa: As. daḳâḳu Pa. break in pieces COT:Gloss; Ph. [[דק]] id., Aram. [[דַּקֵּק]] Pa. id., daq)—
crush (trans.) sq. acc. [[לֶחֶם]] bread-stuff, corn Is 28:28; of threshing ‖[[דּוּשׁ]] Is 41:15 (fig. of pulverizing mts.)
only Pf.; be fine, of state to wh. Moses reduced the golden calf by grinding [[וַיִּטְחַן עַד אֲשֶׁר־דָּקָ]] Ex 32:20; [[וׇאֶכּׂת אׂתוֹ טָחוֹן]] [[הֵיטֵב עַד אֲשֶׁר־דַּק לְעָפָר]] De 9:21.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. [[הֵדַק]] 2Ki 23:15, 2Ch 34:4; 2 fs. [[וַהֲדִקּוֹתְ]] consec. Mic 4:13; Impf. [[וַיׇּ֫דֶק]] 2Ki 23:6, 2Ch 15:16; 1 s. sf. [[אֲדִקֵּם]] 2Sa 22:43 (but [[אֲרִיקֵם]] ‖ Ps 18:43); Inf. abs. [[הָדֵק]] Ex 30:36; cstr. [[לְהֵדַק]] 2Ch 34:7 (form anomalous cf. Ew:§ 238 d O1:§ 258 b Be; rd. perh. [[לְהָדֵק]] Ki; or [[לָדַק]] [v. [[כַּדַּק]] Is 40:15] cf. Öt);—make dust of, pulverize [[וַיׇּ֫דֶק לְעָפָר]] 2Ki 23:6 (i.e. the Ashera), ‖ 2Ch 34:4, 2Ch 34:7 ([[כִּתַּת לְהֵדַק]]); so of the bamah [[הֵדַק]] [[לְעָפָר]] 2Ki 23:15; of the [[מִפְלֶחֶת]] 2Ch 15:16; fig. Mic 4:13 (obj. [[עַמִּים רַבִּים]]); Ex 30:36 (P) has [[וְשָׁחַקְתָּ֫]] [[מִמֶּנׇּה הָדֵק]] and thou shalt beat some of it fine (i.e. the incense); 2Sa 22:43 rd. [[אֲרִיקֵם]] (‖ Ps 18:43) for [[אֲדִקֵּם]].

definitions.title: Hoph.
definitions.body: Impf. [[יוּדָָק]] Is 28:28 be crushed, subj. [[לֶחֶם]] bread corn (cf. supr.
